SELECT u.* FROM vx_user u LEFT JOIN vx_user_department ud ON ud.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN vx_department d ON d.id = ud.dept_id
u.deleted = false
AND u.id = #{param.id}
AND ( d.id = #{param.departmentId} OR d.ancestors LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.departmentId}, '%') )
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.username}, '%')
AND u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.nickname}, '%')
AND u.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT st1.user_id FROM vx_user_role st1 WHERE st1.role_id = #{param.roleId} )
